page.title: 03Education - Primary
page.content:
MILNES PRIMARY SCHOOL
Built in {1938}to accomodate an increasing roll, the six rooms were added to in {1956}.With the centralising policy of the 60's when {Spey Bay}and{Clochan}were added to the catchment area accommodation has remained a major problem. However with the prospect of the Secondary School moving the Primary will return to the site it originally shared as{Milnes {Institution}. The School was split in 1977 when the first Headteacher appointed was a former pupil,Miss Margaret Riddel.Miss Riddel retired in 1985. The roll in{1985 }was {191}with some of the pupils being taught in classrooms vacated by the secondary department.
